item.description:
In the fall and winter, the MFA hosts their "MFAFirstFridays" on the first Friday evening of each month from 5:30-9:30pm. Wonderful art inside the Koch Gallery, mellow music, sundowners and tasty tapa's from the cash bar and the entertaining company and conversation of many of Boston's socially active singles are what you will find at this event.

The March event music will be live - Four Piece Suit - so if you're into jazz, blues, swing, funk or rock, as well as art, you will have the best of both worlds on March 6th.

Blow away the winter blahs with culture and style....

For additional information, see the MFA web-site at: MFA First Fridays

Meet up with your Hostess (Robyn) at the MFA FENWAY entrance at 6:00pm, or find us inside the MFA thereafter.
[NOTE: The West Wing entrance is closed from March 2nd].

Please RSVP a firm Yes or No by Friday noon so that the Organizer knows roughly how many / who to expect at the event. She will also e-mail her cellphone number to the RSVP list (don't want to post it publicly on the Event info).

Any questions? Please E-mail Organizer (Robyn)
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the MFA FENWAY entrance at 6pm / find us inside the MFA thereafter
item.name: First Friday at the MFA - Sundowners, Art & Singles!
